divs: Sighting Detailswe were walking our dog when my husband said look thats a ufo! and i said no way it just looked like all of the rest of the stars to me but much brighter. i said maybee its a planet. it was high up. he said it couldnt be a star because stars twinkle. we stood and argued about it for 5-7 mins as most couples do. it was stationary the whole time, and then it just started to move. although im not sure how fast as i said befor it was quite high up, it was clearing distance fast. then it wasnt bright white anymore it had a red light that was very small in comparison to how the white light looked befor and it was pulsating a very very bright white. like a strobe light. my husband tried to find a pattern in the strobes but couldnt. it moved very very far across the sky from south to north then seemed to stop and stay in place a few minutes, then it was gone from sight
trends: There have been no other sightings in Gill
This sighting has never been favorited.
Summary: saw a ufo in gill co
